title: Video Editor – Funny Vlogs
job_overview:
About the Role:
We’re hiring a fast, creative video editor based in the Philippines who lives and breathes funny, high-energy vlog content. You’ll take raw footage and turn it into viral-ready edits with sharp pacing, Upgrade to see actual info inserts, zooms, captions, and a strong sense of internet humor.

What You’ll Do:

Edit short-form and long-form vlogs with a comedic tone

Add subtitles, sound effects, music, Upgrade to see actual infos, and motion to boost engagement

Understand pacing, timing, and punchline delivery

Work with creators and producers to bring out the best in raw footage

Deliver fast without sacrificing quality

What We’re Looking For:

Expert in Adobe Premiere or Final Cut (CapCut/After Effects is a plus)

Strong portfolio of funny or viral edits (send links)

Fast turnaround, excellent communication, and attention to detail

Deep understanding of TikTok/YouTube Shorts/Instagram Reels culture

Bonus: Background in comedy, Upgrade to see actual info culture, or online creators

Location: Remote
Type: Full-time or contract
Start Date: ASAP

To apply, send your reel or portfolio, your rate, and a quick note on why you get internet humor
